relevant_findings.eye examination: Blue sclera, multiple large flame-shaped, dot blot, and some preretinal hemorrhages heavily concentrated in the peripapillary area of the right eye, scattered punctate intraretinal hemorrhages observed in the macula of the left eye.
Visually significant vitreous and intraretinal hemorrhages in the right eye and mild vitreous hemorrhage in the left eye.
Small, bilateral, scattered intraretinal hemorrhages over the posterior pole.
